TitleEnglish: A Playthrough of a Certain Dude's VRMMO Life
SummaryEnglish: A new type of VRMMO called "One More Free Life Online" is out. He logs in as a young boy avatar called "Earth". Taichi Tanaka (38, single) has a regular office job and enjoys playing video games in his free time. In a world where the player is free to do as they wish, he decides to master a skill that's been deemed to be useless! He makes potions that are too much of a hassle to make, cooks food that is excessively too good, and uses bizarre original weapons to hunt monsters... An adventure manga about an ordinary middle-aged man leisurely enjoying his VRMMO sandbox game!
TitleJapanese: とあるおっさんのVRMMO活動記
SummaryJapanese: 一般ユーザー向けのバーチャルリアリティゲームが発表され、第1弾といえる新型VRMMO「ワンモア・フリーライフ・オンライン」。その世界で、「アース」という名の青年として自由気ままに活動するフツーのゲーム好き会社員・田中大地(38歳/独身)の活動記。不遇スキルと敬遠される弓・蹴りに魔法や生産職まで幅広く手をだし、最強を目指さずバーチャル世界の一期一会を楽しむオンリーワンなソロプレイ。戦場の料理人・妖精たらしなど数々の称号をシステムに付加され、理不尽な人災に見舞われるも、それもまた楽しみの１つと毎日仕事（リアル）を終えたあとの余暇活動で、もう１つ（バーチャル）の人生で「アース」はのんびり彼だけの覇道を歩む。
Aliases: Toaru Ossan no VRMMO Katsudō Ki
Toaru Ossan no VRMMO Katsudou Ki

1.SummaryEnglish: 冴えないおっさん、VRMMOファンタジーで今日も我が道を行く！
An ordinary Japanese dude logs into a brand-new VRMMORPG, ready to adventure in an exciting new world... as much as his work schedule allows!
1.SummaryJapanese: 38歳の会社員である田中大地は、ＶＲＭＭＯ『ワンモア・フリーライフ・オンライン』をプレイするため、アースというキャラクターを作成する。ゲーム内では、早速ツヴァイとミリーという二人のプレイヤーとフレンドになる。目立たないように、不遇とされているスキルを中心に取得したアースだったが、〈隠蔽〉と〈弓〉、二つの不遇スキルを組み合わせると、思わぬ強さを発揮することに気付く――。

2.SummaryEnglish: Earth joins Zwei and his Blue Color guildmates on their hunt for a Wild Bear. Later on everyone is stoked for the upcoming update known as "The Fairy Ball".
2.TitleJapanese: アース、パーティに初参加する

3.SummaryEnglish: Earth becomes an object of adoration for fairies everywhere, as the game gets another big update.
3.TitleJapanese: アース、妖精をたらしこむ？

4.TitleEnglish: Earth Receives a Reward He's Not Sure He's Happy About
4.SummaryEnglish: Silver informs Earth to be careful and avoid Glad, a former party member, who is targeting players with the "Fairy-playah" title. Earth then goes about working on upgrading his skills and crafting new items.
4.TitleJapanese: アース, あんまり素直に喜べない報酬をもらう

5.TitleEnglish: Earth Has a Big Battle With the Queen
5.SummaryEnglish: After Earth meets the Fairy Queen, she rewards him for his efforts by... challenging him to a battle?!
5.TitleJapanese: アース、女王様とド派手に戦う

6.TitleEnglish: Earth Gets Excited Over a New Dungeon
6.SummaryEnglish: The latest patch brought with it a new dungeon, and Earth can't wait to play!
6.TitleJapanese: アース、新ダンジョン実装でテンション上がる

7.SummaryEnglish: Earth fights a powerful boss at the bottom of the game's new dungeon.

8.SummaryEnglish: Earth meets a bossy healer and a hungry dragonian girl, and the Fairy Queen has something to say to him.
8.TitleJapanese: アース、龍人少女と出会う

9.TitleEnglish: Earth Goes to the Fairy Kingdom
9.SummaryEnglish: A new area has opened: the Fairy Kingdom! Earth travels there and is given a special welcome by the Fairy Queen.
9.TitleJapanese: アース, 妖精国へ行く

10.SummaryEnglish: Earth partners with a fairy to save a girl who's gone missing.

11.SummaryEnglish: Earth finds a baby dragon, and also finds himself in big trouble when its parents come to reclaim it!
11.TitleJapanese: アース、赤ちゃんドラゴンを拾う

12.SummaryEnglish: After a green dragon pushes him too far, Earth has finally had enough.
